branchCategory.name: IP8000, Electro-Pneumatic Positioner
branchCategory.description: <p>The IP8000 E/P positioner is more compact than the IP6000 with improved visibility of the pressure indicator. Other features include an improved enclosure protection IP65, interchangeable mounting, excellent shock and vibration performance, and a 1/2 split range available by simple span adjustment.</p>
